title: Stage Lv8-C3-S20
description: Level 8 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: The project on which we worked last year was very successful.
The company for which she works is expanding internationally.
learning_points: Level 8 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 우리가 작년에 작업했던 프로젝트는 매우 성공적이었습니다.
sentences.en: The project on which we worked last year was very successful.

sentences.kr: 그녀가 일하는 회사는 국제적으로 확장하고 있습니다.
sentences.en: The company for which she works is expanding internationally.

sentences.kr: 우리가 운영하는 원칙들은 전혀 변하지 않았습니다.
sentences.en: The principles by which we operate have never changed.
The methods on which he relies are very effective.
The technology in which we invested is revolutionary.
The topics about which they discussed were very important.

sentences.kr: 우리가 협력하는 파트너들은 신뢰할 수 있습니다.
sentences.en: The partners with whom we collaborate are trustworthy.
The department for which he works was newly established.
